workflows.name: Glean probe-scraper
workflows.display_title: Take a copy of the authorization header in the CTOR of taskremovedevi…

head_commit.message:
Take a copy of the authorization header in the CTOR of taskremovedevice in case we are removing the current device - VPN-3976 (#5718)

This will allow the completion of the task even if the client resets the token.
